model_input:

CRITERION:
Helpfulness - The MEMORY should contain information that is both useful and relevant, enabling the Speaker A to respond in an appropriate context to the last utterance of the DIALOGUE CONTEXT. The output format should be as follows:

Choice: (answer with "1", "2", or "tie")

Now choose the MEMORY that has better Helpfulness.

DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: Have you talked to your advisor about your career options? Teaching is probably a good idea since it is a more guaranteed job.
Speaker B: Yes, I did talk to my advisor and it was very stressful. Deciding my whole life when I am really unsure! But I think I will get into teaching, it is a stable career.
Speaker A: It sounds like something that you would really like and be good at! I hope it works out. I would love to teach robotics someday.
Speaker B: That is so cool, you must be really smart! I imagine your parents are so proud. 

MEMORY 1:

Speaker A is working at a pizza shop to pay for college and studying computer science. The dialogue context shows a conversation about career options and teaching plans, with Speaker A expressing an interest in teaching robotics and Speaker B considering a stable career in teaching linguistics. To provide a relevant response, the memory should reinforce details related to their aspirations and how they value education.
